item.title: About
item.description: Hi, My name is Dmitry Momot (Dmytro Momot) and I’m a traveler and freelancer from Kyiv, Ukraine. If you love traveling like me, follow me on Instagram. Technical Background Over 12 yearsâ€™ web development experience, with a proven background of successfully managing web application development phases, from initial design and architecture to deployment and support. More than five years of experience in the management of the R&D teams. Have experience with the following domains: on-demand services, fintech, marketing, recruitment (ATS).
